ValidationRule.description: Prevent the New Pricing Structure field from being updated multiple times.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(New_Pricing_Structure__c), ( PRIORVALUE(New_Pricing_Structure__c) = True ), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot uncheck the 'New Pricing Structure' field.
